answers.answer: Good luck to you with the new dr.  Tell him everything.Read your bio.  Mustang's are cool, aren't they?  I like "House" too.  It's one I first saw via my husband watching tv across the room.  Talk about offbeat!

thanks for advice. i was just a little worried, every time i tell all my problems it scares the  doctors away. my husband says im obessed with mustangs,i still have my first tang i got at 16. i like house but i had a doctor that acted just like him, he was scary and very mean. thanks again, brainpain
Again, good luck.  Maybe this time things will be different.If you're going to have an obsession, I'd say one for mustangs 'ain't too shabby.'  Yeah, that dr is scary.

question: well im going to a new endo friday.my first endo was an a** .he dident look at my labs and said i was obise.his student said my throat was slightly swelled but endo just sent him out of room to get me the weight watchers diet chart.my question is do i mention the other endo visit or keep quiet ? my throat dont look swelled but i am having trouble swallowing ,and i have little hard knots about the size of a pea on each side. what is that and should i be worried? have been getting dizzy and heart palps -2 ekg normal. im sweating alot low grade fever all time.nothing wrong with ears & diabetes test normal.having anger issuses and all my thyroid labs are on the low end normal.is this thyroid related? give me some advice on how to deal with this new endo.  thanks bp
title: going to new endo,
